title: Healing with Spiritual Light
author: Sandra Ingerman
description: During this eight-part online program, world-renowned shamanic teacher Sandra Ingerman presents invaluable shamanic insights and healing tools, then invites you to participate in joyous and powerful ceremonies focused on healing yourself, your community, and the planet.
